item.description:
Welcome to the Providence Collective Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant, event and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: E&O Tap - on Knight Street (near the Avery) over on the West Side

E&O Tap is a FAVORITE with P-Collective Members! Its a little tough to find (they have a sign that's lit up now) but well worth it. Located in a neighborhood setting, its a small brick building with a big, lit up "E" and "O" on the two windows.Â  Considered "a bit divey, but in a cool, hipster kinda way" and a great place to end a night on the West Side, it's located in same area as the Avery (okay, you're almost an RI'er if you know where that is - LOL!). Be forewarned, they don't serve food, but the bartender has a plethora of menus to pick from for delivery - so its kind of the best of both worlds.

So, back by request and popular demand, come over to E&O for some fun and good cheer on the 24th, and let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever. Except Hurricane Sandy.
item.how_to_find_us: Val is hosting this one, please look at her picture! Its a small place - you can't miss us!!!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - E & O Tap!
